title: Cranberry, apple and sausage stuffing
ingredients: ['550g white bread, cubed and baked until slightly dry', '450g mild Italian sausage, casings removed', '50g butter', '535g leeks, coarsely chopped', '4 teaspoons chicken seasoning', '250g celery, chopped', '3 tart apples, such as Granny Smith, peeled, cored and chopped', '120g dried cranberries', '2 teaspoons dried rosemary, crushed', '325ml chicken stock', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
